resource-metadata.title: Metadata
resource-metadata.description: Additional information to identify the resource.

name.title: Name
name.description: The name of the resource. This must be unique.

obsolete.title: Obsolete
obsolete.description: A common annotation that flags the resource as obsolete.

apiVersion.title: API Version
apiVersion.description: The API Version for the PSRule resources.

rule.title: Rule
rule.description: A filter for included or excluded rules.

include.title: Include rules
include.description: Rules to include by name in the baseline.
include.markdownDescription: Rules to include by name in the baseline. [See help](https://microsoft.github.io/PSRule/v2/concepts/PSRule/en-US/about_PSRule_Options/#ruleinclude)

exclude.title: Exclude rules
exclude.description: Rules to exclude by name from the baseline.
exclude.markdownDescription: Rules to exclude by name from the baseline. [See help](https://microsoft.github.io/PSRule/v2/concepts/PSRule/en-US/about_PSRule_Options/#ruleexclude)

tag.title: Tags
tag.description: Require rules to have the following tags.
tag.markdownDescription: Require rules to have the following tags. [See help](https://microsoft.github.io/PSRule/v2/concepts/PSRule/en-US/about_PSRule_Options/#ruletag)

apiVersion.title: API Version
apiVersion.description: The API Version for the PSRule resources.

output.title: Output options
output.description: Options that affect how output is generated.

culture.title: Culture
culture.description: One or more cultures to use for generating output. When multiple cultures are specified, the first matching culture will be used. By default, the current PowerShell culture is used.
culture.markdownDescription: One or more cultures to use for generating output. When multiple cultures are specified, the first matching culture will be used. By default, the current PowerShell culture is used. [See help](https://microsoft.github.io/PSRule/v2/concepts/PSRule/en-US/about_PSRule_Options/#outputculture)

rule.title: Rule
rule.description: A filter for included or excluded rules.

baseline.title: Baseline
baseline.description: The name of a baseline to use.
baseline.markdownDescription: The name of a baseline to use. [See help](https://microsoft.github.io/PSRule/v2/concepts/PSRule/en-US/about_PSRule_Options/#rulebaseline)

resourceTags.title: Tags
resourceTags.description: Additional indexed key/ value pairs for the resource.

ignoreCase.title: Ignore case
ignoreCase.description: Determines if custom binding uses ignores case when matching properties. The default is true.
ignoreCase.markdownDescription: Determines if custom binding uses ignores case when matching properties. The default is `true`. [See help](https://microsoft.github.io/PSRule/v2/concepts/PSRule/en-US/about_PSRule_Options/#bindingignorecase)

nameSeparator.title: Name separator
nameSeparator.description: Configures the separator to use for building a qualified name. The default is '/'.
nameSeparator.markdownDescription: Configures the separator to use for building a qualified name. The default is `/`. [See help](https://microsoft.github.io/PSRule/v2/concepts/PSRule/en-US/about_PSRule_Options/#bindingnameseparator)

preferTargetInfo.title: Prefer target info
preferTargetInfo.description: Determines if binding prefers target info provided by the object over custom configuration. The default is false.
preferTargetInfo.markdownDescription: Determines if binding prefers target info provided by the object over custom configuration. The default is `false`. [See help](https://microsoft.github.io/PSRule/v2/concepts/PSRule/en-US/about_PSRule_Options/#bindingprefertargetinfo)

targetName.title: Bind TargetName
targetName.description: Specifies one or more property names to bind TargetName to.
targetName.markdownDescription: Specifies one or more property names to bind TargetName to. [See help](https://microsoft.github.io/PSRule/v2/concepts/PSRule/en-US/about_PSRule_Options/#bindingtargetname)

targetType.title: Bind TargetType
targetType.description: Specifies one or more property names to bind TargetType to.
targetType.markdownDescription: Specifies one or more property names to bind TargetType to. [See help](https://microsoft.github.io/PSRule/v2/concepts/PSRule/en-US/about_PSRule_Options/#bindingtargettype)

useQualifiedName.title: Use qualified name
useQualifiedName.description: Determines if a qualified TargetName is used. The default is false.
useQualifiedName.markdownDescription: Determines if a qualified TargetName is used. The default is `false`. [See help](https://microsoft.github.io/PSRule/v2/concepts/PSRule/en-US/about_PSRule_Options/#bindingusequalifiedname)

configuration.title: Configuration values
configuration.description: A set of key/ value configuration options for rules.
configuration.markdownDescription: A set of key/ value configuration options for rules. [See help](https://microsoft.github.io/PSRule/v2/concepts/PSRule/en-US/about_PSRule_Options/#configuration)

include.title: Include conventions
include.description: An ordered list of conventions to include.
include.markdownDescription: An ordered list of conventions to include. [See help](https://microsoft.github.io/PSRule/v2/concepts/PSRule/en-US/about_PSRule_Options/#conventioninclude)

apiVersion.title: API Version
apiVersion.description: The API Version for the PSRule resources.

if.title: If
if.description: A condition is made up of one or more expressions that will determine if an object is selected by the selector.
if.markdownDescription: A condition is made up of one or more [expressions](https://microsoft.github.io/PSRule/v2/concepts/PSRule/en-US/about_PSRule_Expressions/) that will determine if an object is selected by the selector. [See help](https://microsoft.github.io/PSRule/v2/concepts/PSRule/en-US/about_PSRule_Selectors/)

apiVersion.title: API Version
apiVersion.description: The API Version for the PSRule resources.

rule.title: Rule pre-condition
rule.description: This only applies to rules that match the specified rule names

apiVersion.title: API Version
apiVersion.description: The API Version for the PSRule resources.

condition.title: Condition
condition.description: A condition is made up of one or more expressions that will determine if the rule passes or fails.
condition.markdownDescription: A condition is made up of one or more [expressions](https://microsoft.github.io/PSRule/v2/concepts/PSRule/en-US/about_PSRule_Expressions/) that will determine if the rule passes or fails. [See help](https://microsoft.github.io/PSRule/v2/authoring/writing-rules/)

level.title: Level
level.description: If the rule fails, how serious is the result. By default this is set to Error.
level.markdownDescription: If the rule fails, how serious is the result. By default this is set to `Error`. [See help](https://microsoft.github.io/PSRule/v2/authoring/writing-rules/)

type.title: Type pre-condition
type.description: This rule only applies to objects that match the specifies types.

with.title: Selector pre-condition
with.description: This rule only applies to objects that match the specified selectors.

ruleMetadata.title: Metadata
ruleMetadata.description: Additional information to identify the resource.

name.title: Name
name.description: The name of the resource. This must be unique.

ref.title: Reference
ref.description: An optional stable opaque identifier of this resource for lookup. This must be unique if set.

alias.title: Aliases
alias.description: Alternative names this resource is known by.

field.title: Field
field.description: The object path of a field to compare.
field.markdownDescription: The object path of a field to compare. [See help](https://microsoft.github.io/PSRule/v2/concepts/PSRule/en-US/about_PSRule_Expressions/#field)

type.title: Type
type.description: The target type of the object.
type.markdownDescription: The target type of the object. [See help](https://microsoft.github.io/PSRule/v2/concepts/PSRule/en-US/about_PSRule_Expressions/#type)

name.title: Name
name.description: The target name of the object.
name.markdownDescription: The target name of the object. [See help](https://microsoft.github.io/PSRule/v2/concepts/PSRule/en-US/about_PSRule_Expressions/#name)

source.title: Source
source.description: The source of the object currently being processed by the pipeline.
source.markdownDescription: The source of the object currently being processed by the pipeline. [See help](https://microsoft.github.io/PSRule/v2/concepts/PSRule/en-US/about_PSRule_Expressions/#source)

allOf.title: All Of
allOf.description: All of the expressions must be true.
allOf.markdownDescription: All of the expressions must be true. [See help](https://microsoft.github.io/PSRule/v2/concepts/PSRule/en-US/about_PSRule_Expressions/#allof)

anyOf.title: Any Of
anyOf.description: One of the expressions must be true.
anyOf.markdownDescription: All of the expressions must be true. [See help](https://microsoft.github.io/PSRule/v2/concepts/PSRule/en-US/about_PSRule_Expressions/#anyof)

not.title: Not
not.description: The nested expression must not be true.
not.markdownDescription: The nested expression must not be true. [See help](https://microsoft.github.io/PSRule/v2/concepts/PSRule/en-US/about_PSRule_Expressions/#not)

notEquals.title: Not Equals
notEquals.description: Must not have the specified value.
notEquals.markdownDescription: Must not have the specified value. [See help](https://microsoft.github.io/PSRule/v2/concepts/PSRule/en-US/about_PSRule_Expressions/#notequals)

notMatch.title: Not Match
notMatch.description: Must not match the regular expression.
notMatch.markdownDescription: Must not match the regular expression. [See help](https://microsoft.github.io/PSRule/v2/concepts/PSRule/en-US/about_PSRule_Expressions/#notmatch)

in.title: In
in.description: Must equal one of the specified values.
in.markdownDescription: Must equal one of the specified values. [See help](https://microsoft.github.io/PSRule/v2/concepts/PSRule/en-US/about_PSRule_Expressions/#in)

notIn.title: Not In
notIn.description: Must not equal any of the specified values.
notIn.markdownDescription: Must not equal any of the specified values. [See help](https://microsoft.github.io/PSRule/v2/concepts/PSRule/en-US/about_PSRule_Expressions/#notin)

setOf.title: SetOf
setOf.description: Must include all of but only specified values.
setOf.markdownDescription: Must include all of but only values. [See help](https://microsoft.github.io/PSRule/v2/concepts/PSRule/en-US/about_PSRule_Expressions/#setof)

caseSensitive.title: Case sensitive
caseSensitive.description: Determines if comparing values is case-sensitive.
caseSensitive.markdownDescription: Determines if comparing values is case-sensitive. [See help](https://microsoft.github.io/PSRule/v2/concepts/PSRule/en-US/about_PSRule_Expressions/#setof)

subset.title: Subset
subset.description: Must include all of the specified values.
subset.markdownDescription: Must include all of the specified values. [See help](https://microsoft.github.io/PSRule/v2/concepts/PSRule/en-US/about_PSRule_Expressions/#subset)

caseSensitive.title: Case sensitive
caseSensitive.description: Determines if comparing values is case-sensitive.
caseSensitive.markdownDescription: Determines if comparing values is case-sensitive. [See help](https://microsoft.github.io/PSRule/v2/concepts/PSRule/en-US/about_PSRule_Expressions/#subset)

unique.title: Unique
unique.description: Determines if each of the field values must be unique.
unique.markdownDescription: Determines if each of the field values must be unique. [See help](https://microsoft.github.io/PSRule/v2/concepts/PSRule/en-US/about_PSRule_Expressions/#subset)

count.title: Count
count.description: Must include all of the specified values.
count.markdownDescription: Must include all of the specified values. [See help](https://microsoft.github.io/PSRule/v2/concepts/PSRule/en-US/about_PSRule_Expressions/#count)

less.title: Less
less.description: Must be less then the specified value.
less.markdownDescription: Must be less then the specified value. [See help](https://microsoft.github.io/PSRule/v2/concepts/PSRule/en-US/about_PSRule_Expressions/#less)

lessOrEquals.title: Less or Equal to
lessOrEquals.description: Must be less or equal to the specified value.
lessOrEquals.markdownDescription: Must be less or equal to the specified value. [See help](https://microsoft.github.io/PSRule/v2/concepts/PSRule/en-US/about_PSRule_Expressions/#lessorequals)

greater.title: Greater
greater.description: Must be greater then the specified value.
greater.markdownDescription: Must be greater then the specified value. [See help](https://microsoft.github.io/PSRule/v2/concepts/PSRule/en-US/about_PSRule_Expressions/#greater)

greaterOrEquals.title: Greater or Equal to
greaterOrEquals.description: Must be greater or equal to the specified value.
greaterOrEquals.markdownDescription: Must be greater or equal to the specified value. [See help](https://microsoft.github.io/PSRule/v2/concepts/PSRule/en-US/about_PSRule_Expressions/#greaterorequals)

startsWith.title: Starts with
startsWith.description: Must start with one of the specified values.
startsWith.markdownDescription: Must start with one of the specified values. [See help](https://microsoft.github.io/PSRule/v2/concepts/PSRule/en-US/about_PSRule_Expressions/#startswith)

endsWith.title: Ends with
endsWith.description: Must end with one of the specified values.
endsWith.markdownDescription: Must end with one of the specified values. [See help](https://microsoft.github.io/PSRule/v2/concepts/PSRule/en-US/about_PSRule_Expressions/#endswith)

contains.title: Contains
contains.description: Must contain one of the specified values.
contains.markdownDescription: Must contain one of the specified values. [See help](https://microsoft.github.io/PSRule/v2/concepts/PSRule/en-US/about_PSRule_Expressions/#contains)

hasSchema.title: Has schema
hasSchema.description: Must use one of the specified schemas of the value of $schema. If an empty array is specified any non-empty $schema can be specified.
hasSchema.markdownDescription: Must use one of the specified schemas of the value of `$schema`. If an empty array is specified any non-empty `$schema` can be specified [See help](https://microsoft.github.io/PSRule/v2/concepts/PSRule/en-US/about_PSRule_Expressions/#hasschema)

items.title: Has schema
items.description: Must use one of the specified schemas of the value of $schema. If an empty array is specified any non-empty $schema can be specified.
items.markdownDescription: Must use one of the specified schemas of the value of `$schema`. If an empty array is specified any non-empty `$schema` can be specified [See help](https://microsoft.github.io/PSRule/v2/concepts/PSRule/en-US/about_PSRule_Expressions/#hasschema)

caseSensitive.title: Case sensitive
caseSensitive.description: Determines if comparing schemas is case-sensitive.
caseSensitive.markdownDescription: Determines if comparing schemas is case-sensitive. [See help](https://microsoft.github.io/PSRule/v2/concepts/PSRule/en-US/about_PSRule_Expressions/#hasschema)

version.title: Version
version.description: Must be a valid semantic version. A constraint can optionally be provided to require the semantic version to be within a range.
version.markdownDescription: Must be a valid semantic version. A constraint can optionally be provided to require the semantic version to be within a range. [See help](https://microsoft.github.io/PSRule/v2/concepts/PSRule/en-US/about_PSRule_Expressions/#version)

includePrerelease.title: Include pre-release
includePrerelease.description: Determines if pre-release versions are included. By default, pre-release versions are not included.
includePrerelease.markdownDescription: Determines if pre-release versions are included. By default, pre-release versions are not included. [See help](https://microsoft.github.io/PSRule/v2/concepts/PSRule/en-US/about_PSRule_Expressions/#version)

hasDefault.title: Has Default
hasDefault.description: The field must either not exist or be set to the configured value.
hasDefault.markdownDescription: The field must either not exist or be set to the configured value. [See help](https://microsoft.github.io/PSRule/v2/concepts/PSRule/en-US/about_PSRule_Expressions/#hasdefault)

caseSensitive.title: Case sensitive
caseSensitive.description: Determines if comparing values is case-sensitive.
caseSensitive.markdownDescription: Determines if comparing values is case-sensitive. [See help](https://microsoft.github.io/PSRule/v2/concepts/PSRule/en-US/about_PSRule_Expressions/#hasdefault)

withinPath.title: Within Path
withinPath.description: The file path must exist within the required paths.
withinPath.markdownDescription: The file path must exist within the required paths. [See help](https://microsoft.github.io/PSRule/v2/concepts/PSRule/en-US/about_PSRule_Expressions/#withinpath)

caseSensitive.title: Case sensitive
caseSensitive.description: Determines if comparing values is case-sensitive.
caseSensitive.markdownDescription: Determines if comparing values is case-sensitive. [See help](https://microsoft.github.io/PSRule/v2/concepts/PSRule/en-US/about_PSRule_Expressions/#withinpath)

notWithinPath.title: Not Within Path
notWithinPath.description: The file path must not exist within the required paths.
notWithinPath.markdownDescription: The file path must not exist within the required paths. [See help](https://microsoft.github.io/PSRule/v2/concepts/PSRule/en-US/about_PSRule_Expressions/#notwithinpath)

caseSensitive.title: Case sensitive
caseSensitive.description: Determines if comparing values is case-sensitive.
caseSensitive.markdownDescription: Determines if comparing values is case-sensitive. [See help](https://microsoft.github.io/PSRule/v2/concepts/PSRule/en-US/about_PSRule_Expressions/#notwithinpath)
